Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Val
Reviews.Content: Got this for a steal. This camera works flawlessly. Takes great pictures and videos. It came with a battery even though it wasn't listed. The battery lasts a month if not used constantly. Charges up fast.

ProductInfo.Features:
14MP digital camera with HD 720p video
5X optical zoom with 28mm wide angle lens
2.7-inch auto brightness LCD
Auto scene, face detection and AE
Smile and blink detection, panorama, red-eye removal and high dynamic range
ProductInfo.Name: General Imaging Digital Camera with 14MP, 5X Optical Zoom, 2.7-Inch LCD with Auto Brightness and 28mm Wide Angle Lens (Black) J1458W-BK
